name: 多變量統計分析
comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENC2053  量化方法與Ｒ語言實作】 ◎課程不開放上修
description: This is an advanced statistics course for graduate students in social sciences. Students are required to complete a fundamental statistics course and a relevant programming course (capable of using R) prior to enrolling this course. We will cover the dimension reduction techniques, regression, classification, and resampling methods. Hands-on programming practice with R will be given in class. Students should bring their own laptops for the practical sessions.
goals: Gain the fundamental concepts in multivariate statistics
Demonstrate the ability to analyze data with R
syllabus:
Week 1: Course overview

Week 2: Overview of multivariate methods; Factoranalysis

Week 3: Factor analysis

Week 4: Discriminant analysis

Week 5: Discriminant analysis

Week 6: Principal component analysis

Week 7: Principal component analysis

Week 8: Midterm exam

Week 9: Multidimensional scaling

Week 10: Correspondence analysis

Week 11: Cluster analysis: K-means andhierarchical

Week 12: Cluster analysis: K-means andhierarchical

Week 13: Regression and classification—Decisiontrees and random forest

Week 14: Regression and classification—Supportvector machines

Week 15: Resampling methods—Cross-validation and bootstrap

Week 16: MANOVA and GLM

Week 17: Moving beyond linearity: Splines and GAM

Week 18: Final exam

methodologies.note: Statistical concepts along with real-life examples will be discussed.
Hands-on practice will be given in class.

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【ENC2053  量化方法與Ｒ語言實作】
